NK040(thi)020:1: // zab mo bdud kyi gcod yul gyi skyabs sems tshogs bsags sngon gtor gyi rim pa bzhugs so //
NK040(thi)020:2: skyabs yul gsal gdab pa ni /
NK040(thi)020:3: mdun gyi nam mkha'i gnas su pad+ma dang zla ba'i
NK040(thi)020:4: gdan la ma cig lab kyi sgron ma la 'khor
NK040(thi)020:5: rigs bzhi'i mkha' 'gro ma rnams dang grub thob gcod
NK040(thi)020:6: yul brgyud pa'i bla ma yi dam mkha' 'gro'i tshogs
NK040(thi)020:7: dang bcas pa rnams kyis bkra dpung nge 'od thibs
NK040(thi)020:8: se bskor nas bzhugs par bsam /
NK040(thi)020:9: skyabs su 'gro zhing tshogs bsags pa ni /
NK040(thi)020:10: ma mi min ye shes kyi mkha' 'gro ma /
NK040(thi)020:11: lab sgron khyed la skyabs su mchi //
NK040(thi)020:12: rang rig ye shes ston mdzad pa'i //
NK040(thi)020:13: bla ma rnams la skyabs su mchi //
NK040(thi)020:14: dngos grub nges par ster mdzad pa'i //
NK040(thi)020:15: yi dam lha la skyabs su brtse gdung dam tshig 'brel ba mo //
NK040(thi)020:16: mkha' 'gro rnams la bgegs dang log 'dren 'dul mdzad pa'i //
NK040(thi)020:17: chos skyong rnams la gang la phul na don che ba //
NK040(thi)020:18: spang rtogs phun sum tshogs pa yin //
NK040(thi)020:19: sangs rgyas rnams la zhi gyur 'dod chags bral ba yi //
NK040(thi)020:20: dam chos rnams gang la phul na don che ba //
NK040(thi)020:21: dge 'dun rnams la gzhon nu'i tshul 'dzin yon tan ldan //
NK040(thi)020:22: 'jam dpal dbyangs la nges par snying rje bskyed mdzad pa //
NK040(thi)020:23: spyan ras gzigs la mthu stobs chen pos gdug pa 'dul //
NK040(thi)020:24: rdo rje la ci srid byang chub snying po'i bar //
NK040(thi)020:25: khyed rnams la ni skyabs su mchi //
NK040(thi)020:26: khyed rnams la ni gsol khyed rnams la ni rten baca'o //
NK040(thi)020:28: phung po lnga po mchod pa bzhes //
NK040(thi)020:29: sdig pa thams cad so sor bshags //
NK040(thi)020:30: 'gro ba'i dge la rjes yi rang //
NK040(thi)020:31: chos kyi 'khor lo bskor du gsol //
NK040(thi)020:32: mya ngan mi mda' gsol ba 'debs //
NK040(thi)020:33: dge des sems can bde gyur cig /
NK040(thi)020:34: rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas sems bskyed do //
NK040(thi)020:38: ma h+aa gu ru d+aak+ki ni sa p+aa ri wa ra man+dala p+au dza +aa h'u /
NK040(thi)020:41: sems can thams cad bde ba dang bde ba'i sdug
NK040(thi)020:42: bsngal dang sdug bsngal med pa'i nye ring chags sdang
NK040(thi)020:44: skyabs yul rnams 'od du zhu nas rang la thim
NK040(thi)020:45: pas sdig sgrib thams cad sang gis dag par gyur
NK040(thi)020:47: de nas dkar gtor gser skyems bshams la /
NK040(thi)020:48: swa b+ha was sbyong stong pa'i ngang las a las
NK040(thi)020:49: thod pa'i snod yangs shing rgya che ba'i nang du
NK040(thi)020:50: +aahmh'u 'od du zhu ba las byung ba'i lha rdzas
NK040(thi)020:51: las grub pa'i gtor ma dngas shing thog pa med
NK040(thi)020:52: par zag pa med pa'i ye shes kyi bdud rtsi
NK040(thi)020:53: rgya mtsho chen po kha dog dri ro reg bya
NK040(thi)020:54: ro bcud nus pa phun sum tshogs pa mgron rigs
NK040(thi)020:55: rnams kyi 'dod pa'i yon tan dang ldan pa stong
NK040(thi)020:56: gsum rab 'byams nam mkha' dang mnyam par bsam 'bar
NK040(thi)020:57: ba'i phyag rgyas dpral ba'i dbyings su bskor la /
NK040(thi)020:58: mig gyen du lta ba dang bcas 'di skad do //
NK040(thi)020:59: badz+ra a ra li ho dzahmh'u bam hoh badz+ra d+aak+ki ni sa ma ya s+t+wam /
NK040(thi)020:62: rang gi snying kha nas 'od zer lcags kyu lta
NK040(thi)020:63: bu dpag tu med par 'phros pas gdod nas grub
NK040(thi)020:64: pa'i dur khrod chen po brgyad la gnas pa'i 'jig
NK040(thi)020:65: rten gyi mkha' 'gro ma thams cad spyan drangs nas
NK040(thi)020:66: gtor ma dngos su gsol bar bsam /
NK040(thi)020:67: kha kha kha hi kha hi /
NK040(thi)020:68: sarba yak+sha rak+sha sarba bud+d+ha pre ta pi sha tsa /
NK040(thi)020:73: e dam b+ha ling+ta g+h+ri h+nan+tu /
NK040(thi)020:75: ma ma sarba sid+d+hi me pra ya ts+tshan+tu /
NK040(thi)020:76: ya the bam ya the s+t+wam /
NK040(thi)020:83: ya ka b+ha wan+tu s+w+aa h+aa /
NK040(thi)020:86: mchod sbyin gyis gtor ma rgya chen po 'di bsngo zhing 'bul ba'i gnas su gyur pa ni /
NK040(thi)020:87: dkyil 'khor chen po'i phyi rol na lhag pa'i mkha'
NK040(thi)020:88: 'gro dang shugs 'gro phyogs zhing skyong ba'i lha klu
NK040(thi)020:90: dkyil 'khor zab mo'i cho ga la nyan par mi dbang ba'i dkar phyogs skyong ba rnams la /
NK040(thi)020:91: mchod sbyin gyi gtor ma rgya chen po 'dis tshim
NK040(thi)020:92: par gyis la 'dir 'khod pa la dkyil 'khor zab
NK040(thi)020:93: mo sgrub pa'i grogs mdzod cig /
NK040(thi)020:94: lha yi tshogs rnams ma lus dang //
NK040(thi)020:95: klu yi tshogs rnams ma lus dang //
NK040(thi)020:96: gnod sbyin tshogs rnams srin po'i tshogs rnams 'byung po'i
NK040(thi)020:97: tshogs yi dwags tshogs sha za'i tshogs smyo byed tshogs
NK040(thi)020:98: brjed byed tshogs mkha' 'gro'i tshogs ma mo'i tshogs rnams
NK040(thi)020:99: ma lus pa rnams thams cad kun //
NK040(thi)020:100: 'dir gshegs bdag la dgongs su gsol //
NK040(thi)020:103: ces gtor ma gser skyems mchod do //
NK040(thi)020:104: de nas bgegs la gtor ma bsngo ba ni /
NK040(thi)020:107: sarba big+h+na na na mahsarba ta th+aa ga ta b+h+yo b+hi shwa lan gsum gyis bsngosa la /
NK040(thi)020:108: khros ma'i mtshams lha bskyed pa ni /
NK040(thi)020:109: phatah rang nyid skad cig gi rje btsun khros ma
NK040(thi)020:110: nag mo zhal cig phyag gnyis dur khrod kyi chas
NK040(thi)020:112: spyi bor phag zhal nag po ngur sgra sgrogs pa /
NK040(thi)020:113: phyag gnyis gri thod bsnams shing gru g.yon kha t+w+aam ka gyen du slong ba /
NK040(thi)020:114: zhabs gnyis gar stabs 'gying ba'i me dpung 'bar ba'i
NK040(thi)020:115: klong na bzhugs pa'i sku'i ba spu las rang 'dra'i
NK040(thi)020:116: khro chung dang me yi tsh+wa tsh+wa dpag tu med
NK040(thi)020:117: pa 'phros / gnod byed rgyal 'gong dam sri 'byung
NK040(thi)020:118: po thams cad tshar gcod pa'i bdag nyid can du
NK040(thi)020:119: pa 'phros / gyur / badz+ra d+aak+ki ni kro te k+aa li bam ha ri ni sa h'u /
